metadata.title: Wednesday, 4th May, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the Masangano-Fisenge road in the Copperbelt Province, which is in a deplorable state, will be rehabilitated; and
(b)    what the cause of the delay in rehabilitating the road is.

questions.minister: Minister of Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    whether the Government has continued to import emergency power from Aggreko, despite the normal rainfall recorded in most parts of the country;
(b)    if so, how many megawatts of power per month the country is currently importing; and

(c)    whether ZESCO has any plans to limit load-shedding in farm areas to night time in order to enable farmers irrigate their crops during day time. (b)    when the Kasalya Bridge, which was washed away, will be reconstructed. W40    Mr Chishimba (Kamfinsa) - to ask the Minister of Home Affairs:
(a)    when the construction of houses for police officers at Kamfinsa School of Public Order Maintenance in Kitwe will commence;
